name: Official FriskyLabs Wordpress Dark Mode
description: Dark mode theme created by the author of FriskyLabs, a Wordpress blog
additional_info:
Version 1.0
- Known bugs are indicated in the CSS as comments. Bugs are a result of the Wordpress color palette set through the Wordpress site settings

Version 1.1
- Added hotfix for all known bugs with dark palette menu
- Stylized text when user has not logged in clicks to type a comment

Version 1.2
- Added more syntax highlighting

Version 1.3
- Added styling for links to previous and next posts

Version 1.4
- Narrowed width of side bar and increased width of main content

Version 1.5
- Styled quote blocks

Version 1.6
- Styled table caption
- Styled C++ primitives

Version 1.7
- Styled pingbacks
